body.p: A note of mine yesterdayClearly “the enclosed” CD asked Charles Collins, Wilkie’s brother, to forward the day before (Pilgrim Letters 8, p. 467). crossed a note from you. Of course it did. Your luck—my luck. (I’ll begin to grumble). I will come up to you this afternoon at 4.
